definition: erhua variant of 枕席[zhen3 xi2]
pillow/to pillow/to rest one's head on (Taiwan pr. [zhen4] for this sense)
woven mat/seat/banquet/place in a democratic assembly/classifier for banquets, conversations etc
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
